title: Can we not lose LP if we have an AFK?
body:
I'm stuck in low elo (Well, not really stuck. I'm just bad.) And I'm trying to climb out but I keep encountering AFK's in every good game i have. This is a recent example. We did so well but were held back by the AFK and it cost us the match after all that effort :/

https://imgur.com/sHSWeQM

Can we like, get a system where you get a pass on a loss if you have an AFK in your team? I'm sure many will argue that it could be easily exploited but the exploits can be fixed just as easily.

replies.body: No because it would lead to people flaming the player with the worst kda to make him leave so they don't lose LP

No. It would encourage people to harass others into AFKing, it would encourage duos to AFK to save their friend's (or boosting client's) LP, and it wouldn't discourage people from AFKing. Riot wants to reduce AFKing, not increase it.
